songs.title: Long Live The Pimp (Intro)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I'm on like a pot of neck bones
Bitch diamonds on the wood
Pocket full of stones bitch
Came up serving hubba to the cluckers
Down in Texas nigga we getting paid motherfucker
Girl want to suck me
Enemies duck me
Niggas in my home town hate but can't touch me
I got five hundred thousand worth of rocks on
And that's my P jewelry they call me Sweet Jones

Hold up smoke something bitch
My trademark know what I'm talking bout
Pimp C going down bitch
Representing that south
Yeah bitch you can put it in your mouth but you gonna have to pay for it
I ain't want no pussy I ain't no rookie bitch
I ain't want nothing but the god damn money
Know what I'm talking bout Like Pimpin' Ken said
You know what I'm talking bout
Real hoes break rookies know what I'm talking bout
Yeah yeah pimp
Get up on the wall bitch you under pimp arrest hoe
Give me everything you got bitch
Yeah yeah yeah I'm going in your pockets hoe
Ooh wee wee
Know what I'm talking about really going down bitch
You know uh you know Don Juan and them uh
Inducted me into the uh fame of player
You know it's really going down
I fuck with Snoop Dogg out on the west coast
You know I get me some Vegas every now and then you know
Fuck with CC
Hey man you know we really having things out here man
Country things hey man I just bought a brand new Rolls Royce
The bitch ain't got no top
It ain't even came in the shop yet man
Get your mind on your money
Church
Sanctuary
